price: (40) So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
